attributes.action: Make picking up litter compulsory to all.
attributes.additional_details:
Change is a bitter sound to a closed eye drive, 
But it is the only solution we have if we want to stay alive.
attributes.background: We are now living in a litter epidemic in Britain, we can all sit around and find someone else to blame but it will never pick the litter off the ground. We must re-enforce what it means to be a human-being and start by making it compulsory to pick up plastics you walk past/see.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Make picking up litter compulsory to all". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
